Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, that player loses 3 life unless they sacrifice another creature.
{U}{B} Page 3
At the beginning of combat on your turn, exile target creature, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
{B}{R} Page 37
{T}: Any number of target players each create a tapped 1/1 red Spirit creature token.
